subject: Tonight on Inside Sport
body:
BBC SPORT

Other e-mail newsletters

















INSIDE SPORT PRESENTER GABBY LOGAN
Hi everyone, Gabby here.


Tonight on Inside Sport - it's the hot topic everyone's talking about - Becks is Back for England. 


We've been to Madrid to talk to fans and players - they're already wishing they hadn't let him go and Ruud Van Nistelrooy tells us he wants Real to get Beckham back on loan.


Also tonight - when you meet world champion boxer Ricky Hatton, he comes as a job lot. In one amazing day with Ricky I also met his brother Matthew, his mum and his dad. It was a bit like the Osbournes, only nicer and more northern.


We've also been to see Dwain Chambers in Germany where he's trying to build himself a new future as an American Football player.  


He was banned for two years for taking performance-enhancing drugs when he was Britain's top sprinter and, he told Matthew Pinsent, he still thinks the science is way ahead of the testers when it comes to drugs.


All that and the chance to win tickets to Wimbledon! 


So join me for Inside Sport at 2305 BST, BBC ONE.



Gabby hosts Inside Sport on Monday 28 May, 2305 BST on BBC ONE, and the second edition on Sunday 3 June, 1130 BST on BBC TWO.
